de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.opt.jcommander

Class HelpReformatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.opt.jcommander.HelpReformatter

  • public class HelpReformatter
extends Object
    Consumes a string or string buffer from JCommander.usage(java.lang.StringBuilder) and reformats it. For each new reformatting string the input must be set.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  HelpReformatter.Entries
      Holds a whole collection of entries.
      private static class  HelpReformatter.Entry
      Helper entity which holds all values of one option.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<String> input
      List of strings to reformat.

      Regular expression to split string by line brakes.
      (package private) static char NL
      Used as line break in output strings.
      private static int SWITCH_PAD
      Number of white spaces to precede each option line.
